scenario.description: You have just connected your HubSpot account to AskElephant and are shown this CRM Readiness Diagnostic panel in your Settings > Integrations page.

task.primary_goal: Understand your CRM health status and what actions (if any) you need to take
task.secondary_goal: Feel confident about whether AskElephant will work with your HubSpot setup

overall_verdict.summary: Strong validation overall. Traffic light system resonates well. Key improvements needed around messaging tone and actionability of remediation guidance.

visibility_of_status.top_feedback: Traffic light is immediately clear; score percentage provides precision

match_with_expectations.top_feedback: Expected to see CRM health after connecting; location in Settings makes sense

user_control.top_feedback: Refresh button is good; want ability to dismiss/snooze issues

consistency.top_feedback: Color coding is consistent; cards follow familiar patterns

error_prevention.top_feedback: Good that it shows issues BEFORE workflows fail; want undo for any actions

frustration.note: Skeptics frustrated by feeling 'blamed' for CRM state

confidence.note: Operations personas most confident; Sales Reps less sure what to do

issues_identified.what: Remediation guidance feels vague—'fix associations' doesn't tell me HOW
issues_identified.why_matters: Sales reps lack HubSpot expertise; need step-by-step or video guide
issues_identified.suggested_fix: Add 'Show me how' button linking to video tutorial or wizard

issues_identified.what: Red status feels accusatory despite careful wording
issues_identified.why_matters: Makes me feel like I've done something wrong; this is often inherited CRM state
issues_identified.suggested_fix: Reframe: 'We found some opportunities to unlock full value' instead of 'Action required'

issues_identified.what: No estimated time to fix issues
issues_identified.why_matters: Leaders need to know if this is 5 minutes or 5 hours
issues_identified.suggested_fix: Add 'Est. 15 min to fix' or 'Typically needs partner help' indicators

issues_identified.what: Want to know impact on AskElephant functionality per issue
issues_identified.why_matters: Need to prioritize—what breaks if I don't fix this?
issues_identified.suggested_fix: Add 'This affects: Deal insights, Pipeline forecasting' per issue

issues_identified.what: No way to dismiss issues I choose to ignore
issues_identified.why_matters: Some issues are intentional choices (e.g., we don't use Companies)
issues_identified.suggested_fix: Add 'Dismiss' or 'Not applicable to us' option

issues_identified.what: Partner link in red state should be more prominent
issues_identified.why_matters: If I can't fix this myself, partner help should be easier to find
issues_identified.suggested_fix: Elevate 'Get help from a partner' to a primary CTA for red status

skeptic.top_concern: Feels like AskElephant is blaming me for CRM issues that existed before
skeptic.top_praise: At least it tells me upfront instead of failing silently later

curious.top_concern: Not sure I can actually fix these issues myself
curious.top_praise: Clear visual indicator of health; like the traffic light

early-adopter.top_concern: Would love to see historical trend of CRM health
early-adopter.top_praise: Proactive approach prevents wasted time on broken workflows

power-user.top_concern: Want API access to run diagnostic programmatically
power-user.top_praise: Finally! This is exactly what partners need to diagnose customers

operations.top_concern: Need more technical detail on what exactly is being checked
operations.top_praise: This replaces 2+ hours of manual CRM audit work
operations.specific_request: Add 'Export report' to share with leadership

sales-leader.top_concern: My team can't fix this; I need to delegate to ops
sales-leader.top_praise: Clear accountability on why AskElephant might not work

sales-rep.top_concern: I don't know how to fix HubSpot; this isn't my job
sales-rep.top_praise: At least I understand why calls aren't syncing now
sales-rep.specific_request: Tell me who to talk to about fixing this

csm.top_concern: Customers will blame us for surfacing their CRM issues
csm.top_praise: Helps set expectations early in implementation

strategic-consultant.top_concern: Needs to be more comprehensive for partner use cases
strategic-consultant.top_praise: This is the missing piece—validates what we tell clients manually
strategic-consultant.specific_request: More granular checks, exportable audit report

hesitation_points.description: Seeing RED score creates defensive reaction before reading details
Guidance is too high-level; not sure if I can do this myself
Clicking opens new tab; worried I'll lose my place in AskElephant

competitive_comparison_mentions.quote: Fathom doesn't do anything like this—I find out my CRM is bad after nothing works
Gong doesn't check CRM health either but they also don't rely on it as much
HubSpot should do this but they want to sell consulting, not give free audits

p0_must_fix: Improve remediation guidance with step-by-step or video tutorials
Soften RED state messaging to reduce defensive reactions
p1_should_fix: Add estimated time to fix per issue
Add 'What this affects' per issue (which AskElephant features)
Add dismiss/snooze functionality for intentional CRM choices
Elevate partner help CTA for red status
